page.title: 06 THE FUTURE.
page.content: A 13 year old believes that in the future we will be transported around on hovering buggies travelling at 800mph.Houses will be powered by solar energy.People will wear leotards,green coloured trousers and jumpers with some symbol on to show where you come from. A 15 year old believes that in the future advanced technology will have taken over many of the menial jobs that humans still do today. Many of the 13 Year olds believed that buildings would be placed underground as precaution against the nuclear bomb. Each building would be equiped with a computer terminal which would enable the householder to purchase goods from home.People would live longer because of transplants.Many felt that living on other planets would have happened.
